items.content_html:
Summary

Addresses issue #17607 by adding Opera to the list of browsers that correctly imply rel="noopener" with target="blank" for anchor tags in HTML.

Test results and supporting details

This was tested by @EDVTAZ, as mentioned in the above issue.

Related issues

No other known related issues.
items.title: Add Opera to correct target="blank" behavior list

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the x_y_z_angle member of the rotate CSS property. The data comes from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v9.1.0).

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/rotate/x_y_z_angle
items.title: Update Safari data for css.properties.rotate.x_y_z_angle

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the quotes_auto member of the quotes CSS property. The data comes from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v9.1.0).

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/quotes/quotes_auto

Additional Notes: The note refers to behavior before the feature was supported, and doesn't seem appropriate to retain.
items.title: Update Safari data for css.properties.quotes.quotes_auto

items.content_html:
This PR is a breakdown list of all the changes created by https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com. This PR will be continuously updated, both on every new collector release and as needed.

Current results: collector v9.1.0, generated April 28, 2023
items.title: mdn-bcd-collector v9.1.0 breakdown list (2023-04-28)

items.content_html: This PR removes the RTCRtpEncodingParameters API from BCD. This feature is a type (ex. a dictionary, enum, mixin, constant or WebIDL typedef) that we have explicitly stated not to document separately from the feature(s) that depend on it, as they are virtually invisible to the end developer.
items.title: Remove RTCRtpEncodingParameters API from BCD

items.content_html:
Summary

Headers.prototype.getSetCookie was added to nodejs in v19.7.0 (undici v5.19.0) and updates other Header prototype methods that were missing node data.

Test results and supporting details

  • https://github.com/nodejs/undici/releases/tag/v5.19.0
  • nodejs/undici@ba5ef44
  • nodejs/node#46711

Related issues
items.title: Update nodejs data for api.Headers

items.content_html: This PR removes the RTCRtpContributingSource API from BCD. This feature is a type (ex. a dictionary, enum, mixin, constant or WebIDL typedef) that we have explicitly stated not to document separately from the feature(s) that depend on it, as they are virtually invisible to the end developer.
items.title: Remove RTCRtpContributingSource API from BCD

items.content_html:
This PR removes the [inbound/outbound]-rtp.qpSum member of the RTCStatsReport API from BCD. Per the data guidelines, this feature can be considered irrelevant and may be removed from BCD accordingly. Even if the current data suggests that the feature is supported, lack of support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v9.0.4).

Tests Used:
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/RTCStatsReport/inbound-rtp/qpSum
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/RTCStatsReport/outbound-rtp/qpSum
items.title: Remove api.RTCStatsReport.[inbound/outbound]-rtp.qpSum from BCD

items.content_html:
This PR removes the RTCIceServer API from BCD. This feature is a type (ex. a dictionary, enum, mixin, constant or WebIDL typedef) that we have explicitly stated not to document separately from the feature(s) that depend on it, as they are virtually invisible to the end developer.

Additional Notes: I'd love for someone to take on the content changes if possible, but if nobody is interested I'd be happy to give the content updates a shot!
items.title: Remove RTCIceServer API from BCD
new bcd: line-style enumerated type
